description.value: Visual acuity is a measurement of sharpness of vision. It is a measure of the smallest details that someone can still distinguish.

purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) VisualAcuity-v1.0(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/VisualAcuity-v1.0(2020EN)).
